column4: anyone want to help me with my screensaver? i can see them load fine in the screensaver wndow, and i can even preview them full screen, but when theyre supposed to load, my screen turns black and thats all.
check that system/power management doesn't turn your screen off just before your screensaver should start
my lcd light stays green, the screen is getting a signal, after 15 mins it turns off like in power management settings
